about_the_game:
Cemetery of Bob is a challenging roguelike auto-battler focused on tactical aspect of gameplay.

Recruit your army of undead

Choose between dead creatures and make them fight for your cause. Every character has unique abilities that can be activated by putting it in front or in back of the lane. Undead have both strengths and weaknesses, which encourages you to look for synergies. Use your strengths and overcome your weaknesses to secure victory over Bob.

Defend cemetery from your opponents

Fight against mythical creatures and army of humans. Opponent and place are very important in this game. Your cemetery is divided into 3 lanes where combat takes place at the same time. Gather knowledge about your opponent to know which undead can deal with him. Depending on which lanes you win, you will earn the appropriate currency.

Upgrade your army

Need undead for your army ? Buy new one at Zero's shop for bones.


Do you need to level up your undead ? You can do this at Elizabeth's shop for some blood.


Or maybe you lack of items ? Visit Charon, he always has something shiny to buy with coins.


Just be careful about Bob... Bob is watching your every move and he doesn't like what you're doing. He wants take over the cemetery. He's so cheeky that he's even in the title of this game... He even claims that it's his graveyard. The audacity of this guy...

Key Features:

  • Fight against randomly generated enemies
  • Choose beetween many unique characters to build your army of undead
  • Find synergy between undead and items
  • Defeat Bob

short_description: Cemetery of Bob is a challenging roguelike auto-battler focused on tactical aspect of gameplay. Build your army of undead. Recruit your zombies, upgrade your skeletons, observe your enemy and adapt to his strategy. Do everything in your power to defend the Cemetery from Bob's usurpation.
